name: Zombie Kill: Night City War
description:
Zombie Kill: Night City War is a really abundant the dangerous zombies who have a complete coverage of a city old town and attacking the innocent people off the area, This a seriously concern for the city management because people are targeting by those half dead and half alive zombies.Your city and towns are infected from them and the blood is everywhere in the city. Shoot the zombies with your latest weapons on their head and be the best killer of the area
Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Easy simple controls
Horrifying visuals and sound
Different in game missions
Variety of guns
Sniper killing missions included
